features: Revitalize & Brighten Your Skin: Experience the ultimate skincare trio with the Face Facts Vitamin C Facial Care Set! Infused with vitamin C for the face, this kit includes a brightening face serum, refreshing facial mist, and lightweight vitamin C face cream to deliver glowing, radiant skin.

Vegan & Antioxidant-Rich Formula: Harness the power of antioxidant-rich vitamin C combined with hydrating agents like Betaine and Glycerin. These products are designed to hydrate, brighten, and balance uneven skin tone while being vegan-friendly, making them ideal for everyday skincare routines.

Hydration Meets Glow: The vitamin C face serum absorbs quickly, prepping your skin for a vitamin C moisturiser for the face that locks in hydration. Pair with the mist for an all-day vitamin C glow, helping to soften fine lines and wrinkles while enhancing natural radiance.

Lightweight and Perfect for Daily Use: This kit is crafted for effortless morning and night routines. Use the vitamin C serum before makeup for a fresh glow, the mist to refresh tired skin throughout the day, and the cream to nourish and brighten before bed. It is ideal for all skin types, including sensitive and oily skin.

Complete Facial Care Solution: Transform dull, stressed skin into a radiant complexion with this vitamin C skincare set. Whether you're looking for the best vitamin C serum for face, a glow-boosting facial mist, or a vitamin C cream for a smoother texture, this kit delivers visible results.
description: Product description Transform your skincare routine with the Face Facts Vitamin C Facial Care Set Trio, a carefully curated collection designed to enhance your skin’s natural radiance. This trio includes a vit c serum, a refreshing facial mist, and a lightweight cream, all enriched with powerful antioxidant-rich vitamin C. Perfect for those seeking a brighter, smoother complexion, these vegan-friendly products work harmoniously to hydrate, illuminate, and restore balance to uneven skin tones. The facial serum absorbs quickly into the skin, making it ideal for layering with the accompanying moisturizer or makeup, while the mist provides an instant refresh, energizing tired skin throughout the day. Whether you're preparing for the day ahead or unwinding at night, this set is your go-to solution for a glowing, nourished complexion. The Face Facts Vitamin C Facial Care Set is designed for daily use and is suitable for all skin types, including those with sensitive or oily skin. The vitamin C face serum helps to improve skin texture, reduce the appearance of fine lines, and support a balanced tone. The facial mist, infused with vitamin C oil for the face and hydrating agents like glycerin, delivers a burst of moisture and radiance in just a few sprays. Finally, the lightweight vitamin c face oil cream locks in hydration without feeling heavy or greasy, leaving your skin soft, smooth, and ready to face the day. Elevate your skincare game with this complete facial care kit and let your skin shine with a healthy, natural glow. Directions Morning: Apply vitamin C serum to face, neck, and décolletage. Follow with vitamin C face cream. Mist can be used throughout the day to refresh skin. Evening: Cleanse face, apply vitamin C serum, mist, and finish with vitamin C face cream. Avoid eye area with serum and cream. Safety Warning For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. See more
